name: Time Wick
description:
Shoot your way through various levels - and when you get shot, reverse time and try again. Be careful though - you have limited rewinds, and you will not get your used bullets back when you rewind!

Controls:

Move - WASD / Arrow keys

Shoot - Mouse Left

Reload - R

Change weapon - Mouse Wheel

Dash - Shift / Mouse Right

Return to menu - Escape
